Add treatment day ('TRTDY') column

Source: R/nif_class.R
add_trtdy.Rd

Add treatment day ('TRTDY') column

Usage

add_trtdy(obj)

Arguments

obj

The NIF object as data frame.

Value

The updated NIF object as data frame.

Examples

head(add_trtdy(examplinib_poc_nif))
#>   REF ID    STUDYID           USUBJID AGE SEX  RACE HEIGHT WEIGHT      BMI
#> 1   1  1 2023000022 20230000221030001  53   1 WHITE  171.3   87.3 29.75086
#> 2   2  1 2023000022 20230000221030001  53   1 WHITE  171.3   87.3 29.75086
#> 3   3  1 2023000022 20230000221030001  53   1 WHITE  171.3   87.3 29.75086
#> 4   4  1 2023000022 20230000221030001  53   1 WHITE  171.3   87.3 29.75086
#> 5   5  1 2023000022 20230000221030001  53   1 WHITE  171.3   87.3 29.75086
#> 6   6  1 2023000022 20230000221030001  53   1 WHITE  171.3   87.3 29.75086
